trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>POST</languageKeyword> request method described in this topic creates a Media Services account in the specified subscription.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>POST</languageKeyword> request method described in this topic creates a Media Services account in the specified subscription.

trans-unit.source: Both request and response follow the data contract described later in this section.
trans-unit.target: Both request and response follow the data contract described later in this section.

trans-unit.source: The request may be specified as follows (replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your subscription ID):

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 201 (Created).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 201 (Created).
